title: Surya Namaskar
description: Surya Namaskar, or Sun Salutation, is a dynamic sequence of yoga postures practiced in a flow.
benefits: Improves flexibility, boosts circulation, energizes the body, and enhances mental clarity.
contraindications: Avoid during recent surgery, severe back pain, or uncontrolled high blood pressure.

title: Tadasana
description: Tadasana, or Mountain Pose, is a foundational standing posture focusing on alignment and balance.
benefits: Improves posture, strengthens legs, and increases body awareness.
contraindications: People with balance issues should practice with support.

title: Vrikshasana
description: Vrikshasana, or Tree Pose, is a balancing posture that promotes focus and stability.
benefits: Improves balance, strengthens legs, and enhances concentration.
contraindications: Avoid if experiencing vertigo or severe knee pain.

title: Bhujangasana
description: Bhujangasana, or Cobra Pose, is a gentle backbend that opens the chest and strengthens the spine.
benefits: Improves spinal flexibility and posture, opens lungs.
contraindications: Avoid during pregnancy or recent spinal injury.

title: Balasana
description: Balasana, or Childâ€™s Pose, is a resting posture used for relaxation and recovery.
benefits: Calms the mind, relieves back tension, and reduces stress.

title: Shavasana
description: Shavasana, or Corpse Pose, is a relaxation posture practiced at the end of yoga sessions.
benefits: Promotes deep relaxation, reduces stress, and integrates practice benefits.

title: Paschimottanasana
description: A seated forward bend focusing on spinal lengthening and calmness.
benefits: Stretches the spine, calms the nervous system.
contraindications: Avoid with severe lower back pain or disc issues.

title: Adho Mukha Svanasana
description: Downward-Facing Dog is a foundational pose combining strength and stretch.
benefits: Strengthens arms and legs, improves circulation.
contraindications: Avoid with wrist injuries or severe shoulder pain.

title: Nadi Shodhana
description: Alternate nostril breathing that balances the nervous system.
benefits: Reduces stress, improves focus, balances energy.

title: Bhramari Pranayama
description: A breathing technique involving humming during exhalation.
benefits: Calms the mind, reduces anxiety, improves concentration.

title: Ujjayi Breathing
description: A slow, controlled breathing technique often used in yoga flows.
benefits: Enhances focus, regulates breath, supports mindful movement.
contraindications: Avoid forceful breathing if dizziness occurs.

title: Kapalbhati
description: A breathing technique involving active exhalations.
benefits: Improves digestion awareness and energizes the body.
contraindications: Avoid during pregnancy or recent surgery.

title: Yoga Nidra
description: A guided relaxation practice inducing deep rest.
benefits: Reduces stress, supports emotional balance, improves rest.

title: Mindfulness Meditation
description: A practice of observing thoughts and sensations without judgment.
contraindications: Those with severe trauma should practice with guidance.

title: Body Scan Relaxation
description: A technique bringing attention to different body parts to release tension.

title: Beginner Yoga Practice
description: A gentle yoga approach focusing on basic postures and breath awareness.
benefits: Builds foundation safely and improves confidence.

title: Advanced Yoga Practice
description: Advanced practice involves complex postures requiring strength and flexibility.
contraindications: Not recommended without prior experience or guidance.
